title: Vaibhavi Emerald Studs: A Touch of South Indian Grace
materials: Oval Cut Emerald Center Stone (approx. 1 carat total weight)
features: These studs feature a delicate, openwork design inspired by traditional South Indian motifs. The central Emerald is bezel-set, surrounded by sparkling Cubic Zirconia stones set in a pavé style. The filigree detailing and the placement of small ruby accents adds a touch of antique charm.The gold is finished with our signature Hyderabadi polish for a lasting shine.
occasions: or as a thoughtful gift. Adds a touch of traditional elegance to any outfit.
description: These Vaibhavi Emerald Studs seamlessly blend traditional South Indian aesthetics with a modern design. The vibrant Emeralds and sparkling Cubic Zirconia stones create a captivating look, while the Hyderabadi gold polish ensures lasting beauty. Lightweight and comfortable, they are perfect for daily wear or special occasions.
